about_the_game:
Trapped within the confines of their home, two siblings embark on a journey to break free from their mother's grasp and unravel the mystery behind their father's disappearance. They must use their wits and work together in order to break through their mother's meticulous locks and cunning traps.

Memories of Misery is a cooperative puzzle adventure where you and your sibling must find a way to escape the mansion you've been trapped in. Each room presents a unique theme and set of puzzles, requiring strong communication and collaboration to solve. Can you escape and solve the mystery behind your family?

Features


  • Co-op: Puzzle components are equally divided between the two rooms the players are locked in, your wits and collaboration are all the tools you have to escape your mother's clutches.
  • Mysterious Mansion: Each room presents a unique theme, delving deeper into the sinister history of your family, with puzzles intricately tied into the dark mysteries of the mansion.

    Note: This game can only be played with two players and it requires an internet connection and voice-chat to play.

content_descriptors.notes: The game involves themes of family abuse.
